scripts.test: npm install sqlite3 --no-save --no-audit --no-fund >/dev/null && NODE_ENV=testing STORAGE=sqlite SQLITE_DATABASE=connect mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 960000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-sqlite: npm install sqlite3 --no-save --no-audit --no-fund >/dev/null && NODE_ENV=testing STORAGE=sqlite SQLITE_DATABASE=connect SQLITE_FILE=`pwd`/db.sqlite node --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 240000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-sqlite-node-cache: npm install sqlite3 --no-save --no-audit --no-fund >/dev/null && NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=sqlite SQLITE_DATABASE=connect SQLITE_FILE=`pwd`/db.sqlite node --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 240000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
